articles.author: Rachel Cohrs Zhang, John Tozzi, Jessica Nix
articles.title: White House Floats Doctor Exemptions for $100,000 Visa Fee - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Doctors could qualify for exemptions from the Trump administration’s new $100,000 fee for high-skilled H-1B visa applications, the White House said Monday, after some of the biggest medical bodies called out the risk to rural America where there’s already a d…
